nodes.text: Boost attribute was a Ta-Ree spell capable of being wielded by Ascendants on the planet Kathol. The spell was similar to the Force power Enhance Attribute. When used, the Ascendant increased their skill in a certain area, allowing them jump higher or shoot better. When activated, the Ascendant was wreathed in a bright, flame-like visual aura. Depending on the particular attribute being boosted, the aura could be one of several colors and behaved differently.
